name: Ascension (Endogeny)
description:
Ascension is a 2D platformer rogue-like arcade game that sees an adventurer navigate through a randomly generated grid of pre-made rooms in order to accumulate as many points as possible. Hack and slash your way to victory, conquering skeletons, flying eyes, and the beast of the dungeon - the Minotaur.

Ascension is a project created for the High School Certificate (HSC) Software Development and Design (SDD) Course by Alexander Kam as his major project of 2020. 

Thanks for choosing to play Ascension :)

Instructions

[A] to Move Left

[D] to Move Right

[Space] to Jump

[J] to Attack / Jump Attack

[K] to Heavy Attack

[L] to Block

[ESC] to Pause

[H] to Hide Instructions

Note

If any bugs or issues are found, it would be greatly appreciated if you could screenshot them and send it to kamzhanyue@gmail.com
